game.name: Police Motorbike Traffic Rider
game.description:
The biggest dream of your life is going to come true in this brand new racing challenge! Do you like to make it possible by playing the role of a police officer who loves making insane stunts on the road? Join Police Motorbike Traffic Rider and be prepared to be one of the fastest and professional drivers in the city! Practice your bike driving lessons first before entering this amazing race fun challenge! This real bike physic game can entertain all irrespective of their age and gender.

All you need to do is just focus on collecting a great number of cylinders with NOS along the way you drive your bike. Do not hesitate in performing the cool stunts to raise your secure bar. The faster you drive on the road the more stunts you would be able to perform on a high speed. Increase your speed to jump off the bridge while performing the deadly stunts in the air! You will have the full control to execute multiple illegal stunt actions in this HTML5 bike driving simulator.

There is no police chasing you, but you would have the full authority to perform the multiple stunts and burnouts. Grab as many nos as you can while making some cool stunts and actions on the road in this motorbike simulation game! Accelerate your speed by pressing gas paddle and do not worry if your fuel runts out as you can refill it again and ride your vehicle again through different challenging roads! Beat the time by racing through traffic on streets, up ramps and into air in this motorcycle-riding simulation!
